definition[0]: to become less sad, or to make someone feel less sad
example[0]: Cheer up! The worst is over.
example[1]: They cheered up when they saw us coming along.
example[2]: You both need cheering up, I think.
example[3]: Here’s a bit of news that will cheer you up.
definition[1]: to make a place look more attractive
example[4]: I bought some posters to cheer the place up a bit.
